name: Ikigai: The Japanese Secret to a Long and Happy Life

title: Enjoyable and enlightening
content: The stories of the adventures of the authors to learn the secret of a long and meaningful life are most inspiring. It was interesting enough to keep me reading. It also has practices and rituals to assist in finding the reader’s ikigai. As I was reading I thought about my purpose and what made me happy. I highly recommend this book to anyone who is looking for a fulfilling life.
post_time: Reviewed in the United States on April 8, 2024

title: Verified Purchase
content: I have never written any reviews for any book but this book is so special, it helps me to calm and find a purpose of my life.
post_time: Reviewed in the United States on June 12, 2024

title: Entertaining book, but not the 'guide to finding your ikigai' I was hoping for
content: Answering these questions for yourself may seem simple at first, but the more you ruminate on your answers, the more you may find that it's not all that easy. However, when you can honestly answer these questions and dig a little deeper, you will find your "ikigai" and life a long and productive life (according to research and commentary by the authors).
post_time: Reviewed in the United States on June 14, 2024

title: Verified Purchase

title: Verified Purchase
content: I wish to give this book 5 star however, there are a lot of questionable research that unless I had a profound study into it, or I probably will not know if it is legit or false information. There are many contradictory upon the ideas. Some of them are actually repackaging. I do wish this book is more concentrated and focus upon the topic , however, even the author doesn’t seems to be research thoroughly. Of course, I did conclude the fact that publishing guide line requires the book to have a set an amount of writings. which is why they probably have to include so many things that are not related to the topic.

title: Verified Purchase
content: Ikigai is one of those books you can either knock out over a weekend or pick up here and there over a couple of months. My only complaints would be that the subject matter sometimes feels scattered and that there are sections that feel more like padding than substance to the reader.

title: Verified Purchase
content: I first learned of this concept “Ikigai” while listening to a pre-selected topic on an app I use during my daily drive to work.  After reviewing several books on this topic, I settled on this one because it cited credible sources, discussed the authors discovery of the concept,  and provided a little more than a simple definition. The authors do a great job of moving through the subject matter with interesting antidotes.  I highly recommend this book for anyone interested in finding their purpose or those who just want to expand their knowledge base on life, happiness and living a long time.
post_time: Reviewed in the United States on June 11, 2023

title: Excellent book
